com.ibm.opencard.service
Interface MFCCardServiceImpl

All Known Implementing Classes:
MFC35CardServiceImpl
public abstract interface MFCCardServiceImpl

Interface for generic card service implementations. A card service implementation is a stateless object that builds the commands that have to be sent to the smartcard. The generic card service offers select as the only method that actually accesses the smartcard. Here is the interface for an implementation.

Method Summary
 MFCCardObjectInfo selectObject(MFCCardChannel channel, opencard.opt.iso.fs.CardFilePath path, boolean info, MFCSelectResponseParser srparser)
          Select a file or directory on the smartcard.
 

Method Detail

selectObject

public MFCCardObjectInfo selectObject(MFCCardChannel channel,
                                      opencard.opt.iso.fs.CardFilePath path,
                                      boolean info,
                                      MFCSelectResponseParser srparser)
                               throws opencard.opt.service.CardServiceObjectNotAvailableException,
                                      opencard.opt.service.CardServiceUnexpectedResponseException,
                                      opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException
Select a file or directory on the smartcard. The select command is useful for file services as well as for signature or other services, since it selects an application and CHV domain on the smartcard. It can also be used to select a directory in which a complex key, for example an RSA key, is defined.
Parameters:
channel - where to contact the smartcard
path - where to select to
info - whether to return information, true if so
srparser - helper to parse the select response for the info to return, may be null if no info is requested
Returns:
information about the selected target, if requested
Throws:
opencard.opt.service.CardServiceObjectNotAvailableException - if the target could not be selected
opencard.opt.service.CardServiceUnexpectedResponseException - if the select response could not be interpreted
opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException - if the terminal encountered an error
